## linearTextureFormatToSRGB() function

Converts a non-sRGB texture format to the corresponding sRGB texture format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function linearTextureFormatToSRGB(format: TextureFormat): TextureFormat;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

format


</td><td>

[TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md)


</td><td>

The texture format to be converted


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md)

The sRGB texture format
